SEARCH
Package gutek.services

Class TranslationService

java.lang.Object
gutek.services.TranslationService
@Service public class TranslationService extends Object
Service responsible for handling translations and managing locale settings.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    TranslationService(AppLocaleSettingRepository repository, org.springframework.context.MessageSource messageSource)
    Constructor initializing the repository and message source.

    Method
    Description
    List<Locale>
    getAvailableLocales()
    Retrieves a list of all available locales based on message property files found in the classpath.

  • Constructor Details

    • TranslationService

      public TranslationService(AppLocaleSettingRepository repository, org.springframework.context.MessageSource messageSource)
      Constructor initializing the repository and message source.
      Parameters:
      repository - Repository for locale settings.
      messageSource - Message source for retrieving translations.

  • Method Details

    • updateLocale

      public void updateLocale(Locale locale)
      Updates the locale setting. If the locale is null, it retrieves the default locale from the database. If the locale is provided, it updates the locale in the database and applies it.
      Parameters:
      locale - The locale to be set, or null to use the default locale from the database.

    • getTranslation

      public String getTranslation(String key)
      Retrieves the translation for a given key based on the current locale.
      Parameters:
      key - The translation key.
      Returns:
      The translated string for the current locale.

    • getCurrentLocale

      public Locale getCurrentLocale()
      Retrieves the current locale. If the locale is not set, it updates the locale from the database.
      Returns:
      The current locale.

    • getAvailableLocales

      public List<Locale> getAvailableLocales()
      Retrieves a list of all available locales based on message property files found in the classpath.
      Returns:
      A list of available locales.
